About Me

My passion lives on learning new things about pshycology, coding and numerology.


BIO

Hello, I am an enthusiatic coder with a nack for solving problems and understanding concepts of numerology, computation and network services.I also like to develop cool apps which are handy in every sense of life.


C++ Expert, Python Adept
